title: Normal (Draft Pick)
body: I have a question in regards of Draft pick, currently there is only Normal (blind pick) and Ranked (draft pick) for the oceanic region, but as i check north america they have Normal (draft pick) also, is there any chance this is getting added to Oceania as we can counter-pick & ban champions, and get positions.

replies.body:
i have played a lot of normal games and i can honestly say that the only reason i would play normals is because i am off my face and shouldn't be playing ranked

ranked has better people and the que system is alot better so as long as you have a runepage for 2 roles and can play 3 champs for each of those 2 roles i would just play ranked
Do we even have the numbers here to enable that?
So when a new type of game que comes out there are loads of discussions and hen it comes out in North America then I think its Korea then OCE.(I'm not 100% how it goes but its similar to what I said)
